head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths BYRAM, HELEN STEWART

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths BYRAM, HELEN STEWART

block.p: BYRAM-Helen Stewart. September 6. Graduate of Rhode Island School of Design, award-winning photographer, world traveler, art department of Western Electric for years. She will be remembered always with love for her adventurous spirit by Liz, Josh, Joe, Eleanor, Katie, Sam, Kippy and her many devoted friends. Contact Church of the Covenant, 212697-3185.
